item.title: Characterization of the Costa Rican Economy through the Social Accounting Matrix
item.description: \usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} The Social Accounting Matrix (SAM), belongs to a set of data prepared by the Central bank of Costa Rica, which allow to be obtaining a relevant information about the country. Among the features that matrix has, is the ability to show the interactions between different agents. It could be inferred, that the SAM is a picture of the economy, keeping the static characteristic. .figure1 { margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 60px; } .
